entry.name: .siblings
entry.description: Get all siblings for each of the current elements, optionally matching the provided selector or element(s)

argument.name: comparison
argument.description: The selector or element(s) to compare the siblings to. If it's an array-like or zQuery object, only one element in the object must match for it to count as a match.

returns.return: A new zQuery instance containing every element that is before or after the current elements
